sense.def:
To fling something somewhere
pomeni nekaj nekam vreči.

seg.quote: She was flinging a few things into her handbag.

sense.def:
To fling oneself somewhere
pomeni nekam se zagnati ali skočiti.

seg.quote: He flung himself down at Jack's feet.

sense.def:
To have a fling
pomeni kratek čas zelo uživati, na primer tako, da počnemo nekaj, kar zahteva veliko moči, ali imamo kratko spolno razmerje;

seg.quote: She had a brief fling while her husband was away.
